author: David Wallace-Wells
title: Is Coronavirus Ushering in a Chinese Future?
description: The world has experienced the pandemic on terms largely defined by one country. That might not be a temporary phenomenon.
content: When, at a meeting of the G7 late last month, Secretary of State Mike Pompeo so fervently insisted that the group refer to COVID-19 as the Wuhan virus that the meeting dissolved rather than issue even an anodyne statement of concern, it seemed, at first blush… [+18747 chars]
